title: create PRD for Money Decision Web App
description:
## Purpose
Create PRD as foundation for money decision web app for makers to manage their finances.

## Core Features
1. **Money Allocation Rules** - Implement popular money management frameworks:
   - 60/30/10 rule: 60% daily life, 30% savings, 10% investment
   - Other rules if applicable (50/30/20, etc.)

2. **Savings Guidance** - Help users decide where to put savings:
   - Emergency fund recommendations
   - Types of savings accounts/options
   - How much to keep as emergency fund

3. **Investment Guidance** - Educate users about investment options:
   - Reksadana (mutual funds)
   - Stocks (saham)
   - Crypto
   - Other investment vehicles
   - Risk levels for each option

## Target Users
- Makers/ freelancers who need guidance on money management
- People who want structured approach to personal finance

## Output
Complete PRD document that serves as foundation for development
close_reason: Created comprehensive PRD at /docs/prd-money-decision.md covering: 1) Money allocation rules (60/30/10, 50/30/20, custom), 2) Savings guidance with emergency fund targets and where to keep savings, 3) Investment options including reksadana, stocks, crypto, with risk levels, 4) User flows, 5) Features list, 6) Technical requirements, 7) Design guidelines, 8) Success metrics

Build Money Allocation Calculator
description:
## Objective
Build the core calculator feature that helps users split their income according to proven budget rules.

## Features
1. **Income Input** - User enters monthly/annual income
2. **Rule Selection** - Choose from:
   - 50/30/20 rule
   - 60/30/10 rule
   - 70/20/10 rule
   - Ramit Sethi's CSP (50-60% fixed, 10% investment, 5-10% savings, 20-35% guilt-free)
   - Custom allocation
3. **Calculation** - Compute breakdown based on selected rule
4. **Results Display** - Show amounts for each category (Daily Life/Needs, Savings, Investment/Wants)

## Technical Requirements
- React component with clean UI
- Input validation for income
- Real-time calculation updates
- Responsive design
- Support for IDR currency format

## Related
Based on PRD Section 2 (Money Allocation Frameworks)
close_reason: Completed: Built MoneyCalculator component with income input, rule selection, results display, savings breakdown, and investment profile. Uses React useState and useMemo for state management.

title: Add Savings Breakdown Recommendations
description:
## Objective
Add detailed breakdown recommendations for the savings category showing emergency fund, short-term goals, and long-term goals allocation.

## Features
- When savings allocation is calculated (e.g., 30%), show sub-categories:
  - **Emergency Fund**: 50% of savings - safety net
  - **Short-term Goals**: 30% - vacation, gadgets, courses (within 1 year)
  - **Long-term Goals**: 20% - education, vehicle, wedding (1-5 years)
- Show emergency fund target in months (e.g., "6 months = Rp 18,000,000")
- Recommend where to keep each type of savings (HYSA, Money Market, etc.)

## UI Display


## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Savings automatically divided 50/30/20
- [ ] Each sub-category has color indicator
- [ ] Emergency fund shows months of expenses
- [ ] "Where to keep" recommendation shown for each

## Reference
/docs/rfc.md Section 9.8 (User Story 9.8)
close_reason: Completed: Created SavingsBreakdownComponent.tsx showing 50/30/20 split within savings: Emergency Fund (50%), Short-term Goals (30%), Long-term Goals (20%). Includes target amounts and recommendations.

title: Add Investment Risk Profile Selector
description:
## Objective
Add investment recommendations that change based on user risk profile selection (Aggressive vs Passive).

## Features
- Toggle between "Aggressive" and "Passive" investment profiles
- **Passive Profile** (low risk):
  - Reksadana Pasar Uang (40%)
  - Reksadana Pendapatan Tetap (40%)
  - Bonds/Obligasi (20%)
  - Expected return: 4-8% annually
- **Aggressive Profile** (high risk):
  - Reksadana Saham (50%)
  - Crypto - BTC/ETH (30%)
  - Reksadana Campuran (20%)
  - Expected return: 10-50% annually
- Show warning for high-risk investments (crypto)
- Show amount in IDR for each recommendation

## UI Display


## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Toggle between profiles updates recommendations
- [ ] Each investment shows percentage and IDR amount
- [ ] Crypto shows warning about high risk
- [ ] Risk level explained for each option

## Reference
/docs/rfc.md Section 9.9 (User Story 9.9)
close_reason: Completed: Created InvestmentProfile.tsx with risk profile toggle (Passive/Aggressive). Shows investment recommendations based on profile: Passive (Reksadana Pasar Uang, Pendapatan Tetap, Obligasi) vs Aggressive (Reksadana Saham, Crypto, Campuran).
